channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Bargain Hunt
channel.desc: Caroline Hawley presents a fever-pitched football special from Detling in Kent. Two teams of football fans shop for three items to take to auction, with the help of experts Tim Weeks and Nick Hall. There's plenty of friendly rivalry as they try to score the best deals. Caroline meets Baz Davison to discuss his collection of retro World Cup 1994 football shirts.
